strategy: Craftworld Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4. Craftworld Ulthwé are also subject to the 'Seers of Ulthwé' special rule.
Initiative: Aspect Warriors, Titans, Eldar Knights and the Avatar formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. In addition, formations containing a Seer Counci, Farseer or Mounted Farseer are subject to the 'Black Guardians' special rule.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Eldar Craftworld Ulthwé.

formations.name: 1 Wraithgates
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: Black Guardian Warhost
extraUnits: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Heavy Weapon Platforms: Free

formations.name: Mounted Black Guardian Warhost
formations.units: One Farseer, five Eldar Guardians, three Wave Serpents
extraUnits: Replace two Guardians with two Wraithguards and a Wave Serpent: 100 points

sections.name: Ulthwé High Troupes
sections.description: Up to one High Troupe for each Ulthwé Warhost taken

formations.name: Windriders of Ulthwé
formations.units: One Mounted Farseer, five Eldar Jetbikes
extraUnits: Replace up to five Eldar Jetbikes with Vypers: Free

formations.name: Swords of Ulthwé
formations.units: One Farseer, three Eldar Guardians, four Falcons

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Troupe
formations.units: Six Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Shining Spears, Striking Scorpions, Swooping Hawks, Warp Spiders

sections.name: Ulthwé Line Troupes
sections.description: Up to two Troupes for each Ulthwé Warhost taken

formations.name: Rangers
extraUnits: Add one Eldar Rangers unit: 25 points

formations.name: Engines of Vaul
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
extraUnits: Add up to two additional Engines of Vaul (Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent): 200 points each

formations.name: War Walker Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two additional War Walkers: 25 points each

sections.name: Ulthwé Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Ulthwé Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Seer Council
items.description: Replace one Farseer with an Seer Council

items.name: Firestorm
items.description: Add one Firestorm to the formation

items.name: Wraithlords
items.description: Add up to three Eldar Wraithlords
